content:
franklin knows that not everything can go his way; some things that he supports will be passed and some things that he disagrees with also be passed
he knows the good intentions of the creators and how everyone in that room wants to do good for the country and thus even though he finds some things he disagrees with he will still root for its ratification

“On the whole, Sir, I can not help expressing a wish that every member of the Convention who may still have objections to it, would with me, on this occasion doubt a little of his own infallibility, and to make manifest our unanimity, put his name to this instrument.”
